verses.verse: <S%H238>Listen<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H5956>Don't<s%> hide yourself from my <S%H8467>supplication.<s%>
<S%H7181>Attend<s%> to <S%H6030>me,<s%> and answer <S%H7300>me.<s%> I am restless in my <S%H7879>complaint,<s%> and <S%H1949>moan,<s%>

Because of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H6125>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> For they <S%H4131>bring<s%> <S%H205>suffering<s%> on <S%H639>me.<s%> In anger they hold a grudge against <S%H7852>me.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is severely <S%H2342>pained<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H367>me.<s%> The terrors of <S%H4194>death<s%> have fallen on <S%H5307>me.<s%>
<S%H3374>Fearfulness<s%> and <S%H7461>trembling<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H6427>me.<s%> Horror has overwhelmed <S%H3680>me.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I had <S%H83>wings<s%> like a <S%H3123>dove!<s%> Then I would fly <S%H5774>away,<s%> and be at <S%H7931>rest.<s%>
<S%H5074>Behold,<s%> then I would wander far <S%H7368>off.<s%> I would <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
"I would <S%H2363>hurry<s%> to a <S%H4655>shelter<s%> from the <S%H5584>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> and <S%H5584>storm.<s%>"

<S%H1104>Confuse<s%> <S%H136>them,<s%> Lord, and <S%H6385>confound<s%> their <S%H3956>language,<s%> for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7379>strife<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H3119>Day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> they prowl <S%H5437>around<s%> on its <S%H2346>walls.<s%> <S%H205>Malice<s%> and <S%H5999>abuse<s%> are also within <S%H7130>her.<s%>
<S%H1942>Destructive<s%> forces are <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H8496>her.<s%> Threats and <S%H4820>lies<s%> <S%H4185>don't<s%> depart from her <S%H7339>streets.<s%>

For it was not an <S%H341>enemy<s%> who <S%H2778>insulted<s%> <S%H5375>me,<s%> then I could have endured <S%H8130>it.<s%> Neither was it he who hated me who <S%H1431>raised<s%> himself up against <S%H5641>me,<s%> then I would have hidden myself from him.
But it was <S%H582>you,<s%> a man <S%H6187>like<s%> <S%H441>me,<s%> my companion, and my familiar <S%H3045>friend.<s%>
We took <S%H4985>sweet<s%> <S%H5475>fellowship<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> We <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H7285>company.<s%>

Let <S%H4194>death<s%> come <S%H5377>suddenly<s%> on <S%H3381>them.<s%> Let them go down <S%H2416>alive<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> For <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in their <S%H4033>dwelling,<s%> in their <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
As for <S%H7121>me,<s%> I will call on <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will save <S%H3467>me.<s%>
<S%H6153>Evening,<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> I will <S%H7878>cry<s%> out in <S%H1993>distress.<s%> He will <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
He has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H7128>battle<s%> that was against <S%H7227>me,<s%> although there are many who oppose me.

<S%H410>God,<s%> who is <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> <S%H6924>forever,<s%> will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H5542>them.<s%> Selah. They never <S%H2487>change,<s%> who <S%H3372>don't<s%> fear <S%H430>God.<s%>
He <S%H7971>raises<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> against his <S%H7965>friends.<s%> He has <S%H2490>violated<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H2505>smooth<s%> as <S%H4260>butter,<s%> but his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7128>war.<s%> His <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H7401>softer<s%> than <S%H8081>oil,<s%> yet they were drawn <S%H6609>swords.<s%>

<S%H7993>Cast<s%> your <S%H3053>burden<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will <S%H3557>sustain<s%> <S%H5769>you.<s%> He will never <S%H5414>allow<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>

But <S%H430>you,<s%> God, will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H875>pit<s%> of <S%H7845>destruction.<s%> <S%H1818>Bloodthirsty<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> shall not live out <S%H2673>half<s%> their <S%H3117>days,<s%> but I will trust in <S%H982>you.<s%>
